Record Class GooseOptions

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
org.tanzu.goose.cf.GooseOptions
public record GooseOptions(Duration timeout, String model, String provider, int maxTurns, Path workingDirectory, Map<String,String> additionalEnv) extends Record
Options for configuring Goose CLI execution.

Use the builder pattern to create instances: 

GooseOptions options = GooseOptions.builder()
    .timeout(Duration.ofMinutes(10))
    .model("claude-sonnet-4-20250514")
    .maxTurns(50)
    .build();
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Goose Buildpack Team

    • equals

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. Reference components are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object); primitive components are compared with the compare method from their corresponding wrapper classes.
      Specified by:
      equals in class Record
      Parameters:
      o - the object with which to compare
      Returns:
      true if this object is the same as the o argument; false otherwise.
